title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
steps: Name 4 things you can feel (chair, clothes, feet on floor).
Name 1 thing you can taste (or a comforting thought).
notes: Use when your mind is racing or you feel panicky.
source: General grounding technique used in CBT/DBT skills education.

title: Box Breathing (1 minute)
notes: Helps your body shift out of fight-or-flight.
